request.description:
Get a list of all available job types.

Authorization required: Customer token

response.name: Job Types List
response.body:
[

request.description:
Get details of a specific job type by ID.

Authorization required: Customer token

Create a new job type (admin only).

Authorization required: Admin token

response.name: Job Type Created
response.body:
{
    "id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000005",
    "name": "New Job Type",
    "description": "Description of new job type",
    "enabled": true,
    "processor_type": "CPU",
    "standard_cost_cents": 150,
    "processing_logic_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000005",
    "metadata": {
        "supported_formats": ["txt", "csv", "json"],
        "max_file_size_mb": 50
    },
    "created_at": "2025-04-09T16:58:30Z",
    "updated_at": "2025-04-09T16:58:30Z"
}

variable.description: UUID of the job type to update

request.description:
Update an existing job type (admin only).

Authorization required: Admin token

response.name: Job Type Updated
response.body:
{
    "id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000005",
    "name": "New Job Type",
    "description": "Updated description for job type",
    "enabled": true,
    "processor_type": "CPU",
    "standard_cost_cents": 175,
    "processing_logic_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000005",
    "metadata": {
        "supported_formats": ["txt", "csv", "json", "xml"],
        "max_file_size_mb": 75
    },
    "created_at": "2025-04-09T16:58:30Z",
    "updated_at": "2025-04-09T17:00:15Z"
}
